explains: n. 告密者；通知者；控告人

sentences.en: One of the gang members had turned informer.
sentences.cn: 团伙中的一员后来变成了告密者。

sentences.en: Prentice saw Goss fall in behind the informer.
sentences.cn: 普伦蒂斯看见戈斯走在密探身后。

sentences.en: The police has informer in the London underworld.
sentences.cn: 警察在伦敦的下流社会中有告密者。
